title: Welcome to Hive-Pal!
subtitle: Let's set up your beekeeping environment

welcome.title: Start Your Beekeeping Journey
welcome.description: Welcome to Hive-Pal, your digital beekeeping assistant! We'll guide you through setting up your first apiary and hive to get you started.

apiary.title: Create Your First Apiary
apiary.description: An apiary is a location where your hives are kept. Let's create your first one.

hive.title: Add Your First Hive
hive.description: Now let's add your first hive to your new apiary: {{apiaryName}}.

complete.title: Congratulations!
complete.description: You've successfully set up your first apiary and hive. You're ready to start tracking your beekeeping activities with Hive-Pal!
